text: We can't believe what he is saying because he had sex with a prostitute.

You haven't held a steady job since 1992. Worse than that, we couldn't find a single employer who'd provide you with a good reference.
You've only ever lived in the city. The issues that matter to America's heartland are clearly beyond your comprehension.
People like you don't understand what it's like to grow up black in America. You have no right to argue about the gang violence on our streets.

Well, it's pretty obvious that your political party doesn't know how to be fiscally responsible, so I wouldn't expect you to be either.

Well, I think we need to look at Senator Smith's failures regarding this issue.

The only reason you could possibly be in favor of this is because you're not being honest about your own sexuality.

Perhaps if you weren't Mormon, you would see this quite differently.

This is a female issue. As a man, how can you have an opinion about this?

Socrates' arguments about human excellence are rubbish. What could a man as ugly as he know about human excellence.

Yeah, I think everyone's opinion counts on moral matters like that, but that Lila sleeps around with anything. I know of at least one marriage she's broken up, so why should her opinion count on anything, much less morality?
Of course Marx' theories about the ideal society are bunk. The guy spent all his time in the library.
We cannot approve of this recycling idea. It was thought of by a bunch of hippie communist weirdos.
There's no reason to take seriously Nietzsche's ideas about the Superman. Weak and sickly all his short life, of course he found this concept captivating. In psychology, we call this compensation.

No, I will not reply. I see no need to defend my views against the objections of ignoramuses.
How can you argue your case for vegetarianism when you are enjoying that steak?
He's not a great athlete, he's a fraud, a cheat and a liar. That's why not everybody is ‘happy for Lance.'

My opponent was not decent in his arguments in the past, so now he is not either.
Now you tell me she looks presidential, folks. I look presidential.

She is for raising the minimum wage, but she is not smart enough to even run a business.

Well, you don't know anything about this field, so why should anyone listen to you?
You're not an economics professor, so there's not reason for me to listen to you.

I think that you're stupid and that nobody cares about your opinion.

Sam asks the audience whether we should believe anything from a woman who isn't married, was once arrested, and smells a bit weird.
My opponent suggests that lowering taxes will be a good idea -- this is coming from a woman who eats a pint of Ben and Jerry's each night!

Tony wants us to believe that the origin of life was an “accident”.  Tony is a godless SOB who has spent more time in jail than in church, so the only information we should consider from him is the best way to make license plates.

Secretary of State John Kerry says that there is less violence than usual in the world right now. Meanwhile the Director of National Intelligence, James Clapper, says the opposite, that terrorism is more violent and dangerous than ever. Since Clapper is Director of National Intelligence, maybe Kerry should have the title Director of National Stupidity.
Excessive pride and envy have destroyed Jean-Jacques, my illustrious philosopher. That monster dares speak of education! He abandoned his children and the tramp with whom he made them.
What could you possibly know about this, you are an unemployed loser who spends all his time watching Netflix.
Friedrich Nietzsche was an ugly man who never married, you shouldn't take any of his ideas seriously.
Richard Dawkins, an evolutionary biologist and perhaps the foremost expert in the field, says that evolution is true. Therefore, it's true.
How do I know the adult film industry is the third largest industry in the United States? Derek Shlongmiester, the adult film star of over 50 years, said it was. That's how I know.
Channeling the spirits of the dead is real, because John Edward says he can do it and he is an expert.

My favorite actor, who appeared in a movie about AIDS, has testified that the HIV virus doesn't really cause AIDS and that there has been a cover-up. So, I think that AIDS must be caused by something other than HIV and the drug companies are hiding it so that they can make money from expensive anti-HIV drugs.
According to government experts, the new nuclear storage facility poses no dangers.
Environmental experts have demonstrated that global warming does not really exist.
I know a chemist who is an expert in his field, and according to him evolution is nonsense.
They say that crime is increasing because of a lax court system.
If the Pope says that an aspect of doctrine is true, then it should be added to the creed, since he is infallible.
The mayor said that the crime rate is down. The statistics claiming otherwise must be erroneous.
Being a movie star gave me the motivation to develop this new diet, which is safer and more effective than conventional diets.
Our new diet is endorsed by this famous movie star, who said that it is safer and more effective than conventional diets.
I'm following this new diet, because my favorite movie star said that it's safer and more effective than conventional diets.
They say that this new diet is safer and more effective than conventional diets, which is why I've decided to use it.

As a movie star who won multiple Academy Awards and who's latest movie series made over a billion dollars in the US alone, I had a strong motivation to find a way to lose weight. That's why I developed this new diet, which is safer and more effective than conventional diets.
I don't believe in the conventional diets that doctors and dietitians try to get you to use. I prefer this new diet, which my favorite movie star just said is safer and more effective.
This diet is safer and more effective than conventional diets, because that's what my favorite movie star said.
Albert Einstein, one of the smartest people ever, said that the best and healthiest breakfast is bacon and eggs, so it must be true.
Climate change cannot be real because one environmental scientist, who has been studying climate change, says it is not real.
Not able to defend his position that evolution 'isn't true' Bob says that he knows a scientist who also questions evolution (and presumably isn't a primate).
Everyone is going to get the new smart phone when it comes out this weekend. Why aren't you?
I saw Cady Heron wearing army pants and flip-flops, so I bought army pants and flip-flops.

You believe that those who receive welfare should submit to a drug test, but your friends tell you that idea is crazy and they don't accept it. You decide to change your position based on their beliefs.
Katie likes to read and would rather do that than play sports. Her friends make fun of her and tell her that reading is for nerds. Katie stops reading so much and starts to play sports more.

Marcus wants to go to a small community college close to home, but most of the kids in his class are applying to larger colleges out of state. Marcus decides that he should also apply to those colleges.
Marie notices that many of her friends have started eating a low-carb diet and drinking protein shakes. Marie decides that this must be the healthy way to eat, so she joins them.

Cathy is opposed to social media because she would rather have a face-to-face conversation. However, more and more of Cathy's friends have joined social media sites, so Cathy feels like she needs to create an account as well.

Ian was raised in a Christian home. When Ian goes to college, many of the students do not believe in Jesus and do not attend church. Ian begins to doubt his faith because of his new friends' lack of faith.
During the obstacle course, Tanner believes that going left will get them out of the maze, but everyone else thinks they should go right. So, Tanner goes with the group.
Commercial argues that "everyone" likes a specific brand of dessert.

Caroline eats a well-rounded diet and exercises on a regular basis. However, all of her friends at work are starting a low-carb diet that consists mostly of protein shakes. Her officemate tells Caroline about their plan and how they're going to all keep each other accountable, so she should join in. Caroline decides this must be the healthy thing to do so she agrees to do this special diet along with everyone else.
Because everyone else goes away to college, it must be the right thing to do.

Sarah believes social media is damaging to relationships. She prefers face-to-face interactions and thinks communication can be misunderstood through social media. However, because all of her friends have joined and talk to each other through this medium, Sarah has decided it must not be that bad and creates an account.

[Margaret] Mitchell enhanced the GWTW [Gone With the Wind] mystique by never publishing another novel. But who would be so churlish as to want more? Read it. Ten million (and counting) Americans can't be wrong, can they?"

There must be some truth to astrology since around 25% of adults in America believe in it. That many people can't be wrong!

Whilst rallying support for his plan to fundamentally undermine citizens' rights, the Supreme Leader told the people they were either on his side, or they were on the side of the enemy.
You must be a Republican or Democrat. You are not a Democrat. Therefore, you must be a Republican.
Either support this bill or be unpatriotic.
Either buy this car or be unhappy.

It is always wrong to lie or it is never wrong to lie.

We need to stop allowing colleges to increase tuition every year. The next thing we know, it's going to cost more to attend college for one semester than it is to buy a new home!
You should never gamble. Once you start gambling you find it hard to stop. Soon you are spending all your money on gambling, and eventually you will turn to crime to support your earnings.

There are so many experiences in the human realm that are wonderful. Sexual intimacy between two willing adults who love each other is wonderful. A therapist helping a client is wonderful. When the relationship between a therapist and client is so deep that it could be characterized as love, it's wonderful. When all these acts become part of one process between two people, it must be exceptionally wonderful. How could anyone condemn such a wonderfully human process as unethical?

Siblings Dan and Joe had a serious argument, and Dan told Joe that he hated him and wished that he would get hit by a car. Two days later, Dan was told that Joe had been struck by a car. Dan blamed himself and thought that if he hadn't made the comment during their fight, Joe would not have been hit.

Every time I go to sleep, the sun goes down. Therefore, my going to sleep causes the sun to set.

Since Lucy Sutton became vice president of the parent-teacher association, student performance has declined and teacher morale is down. We on the school board believe that Sutton bears sole responsibility for the downtrend.
You oversleep and then fail a test so you assume that oversleeping causes you to fail tests
Your sister broke her arm, and then you broke your nose. So you assume that a sibling breaking a bone causes you to break one too.
My grandmother ate 10 cloves of raw garlic every day. Not surprisingly she lived to be 102.
The economy continues to grow as the number of likes on my Instagram account continue to increase. Clearly, the two are linked.
Tommy went to go swimming for the afternoon and later bought a lottery ticket. He won the lottery which must mean that swimming makes you win the lottery.
Kevin's dog scratched his leg, and that night he had a fever. Kevin concluded that his dog must have infected him with something.
Our soccer team was losing until I bought new shoes. We have not lost a game since I got my lucky shoes!
She took a drink from the drinking fountain yesterday and now she's sick. It must have been the public fountain that made her sick.
I broke a mirror earlier in the day, and then I received an F on my history final. Therefore, I received the F because I broke the mirror.
Our house was burglarized right after that new family moved in next door. Therefore, that new family must have been involved.
Every day, I eat cereal for breakfast. One time, I had a muffin instead, and there was a major earthquake in my city. I've eaten cereal ever since.
Every time that rooster crows, the sun comes up. The rooster must control the sun.
Since Samantha got that new apron, she hasn't burned any cookies. That new apron sure does help her cooking!
The party was going great! Then Gerald showed up and little by little people started collecting their coats and heading home. Gerald ruined the party.
My brother received the COVID-19 vaccine and then had diarrhea for a week. The vaccine is the reason my brother's bowels came undone.

During the early 2000s, the search for a cause of autism led to vaccines, though no scientific link has been found between the administration of vaccines and the onset of autism. The time that children are vaccinated and the time they're diagnosed do closely correlate, however, leading upset parents to assign blame to the immunizations, for lack of a better explanation.
If the country is ever going to be safe from terrorists we have to close the borders.

Farmer McDonald: Ever since they put up that new power plant across the river, we haven't had a bit of rain. I'm tellin' you, mankind has got too big for its britches when it fiddles around with nature.
I ate Oreos, and then I was sick the next day. It must have been the Oreos that caused my sickness.
Joey's refrigerator broke after Rachel moved in therefore, Rachel caused Joey's refrigerator to break.
I passed my math test after going out to the movies the night before. I should go to the movies the night before every math test!
Every girl I've dated has been a nurse. I must only be compatible with nurses!

Global chocolate consumption is highest in Switzerland, yet people there are among the trimmest in the industrialized world.  therefore, it's reasonable to conclude that chocolate helps keep your weight down.

Jason and his family are heading to Utah to spend a week skiing. Looking at the weather reports, he notices that it is supposed to be warmer, making for lousy ski conditions. Angrily, he calls the Weather Channel and demands that they change their forecast so he will have better weather for the trip.

The flu vaccine comes out every year just before the holidays, then people go and spend a lot of money. Therefore, businesses are secretly using the flu vaccine as a mind control device to increase holiday spending.
Eating five candy bars and drinking two sodas before a test helps me get better grades. I did that and got an A on my last test in history.
I sneezed at the same time the power went off. My sneeze did something to make the power go off.

I dropped the ball because Mercury is in retrograde.

The Soviet Union collapsed after taking up atheism. Therefore, we must avoid atheism for the same reasons.
Families communicate less and less in the past forty years since feminism became mainstream. Feminism is to blame for this deterioration in the family.

Our garage sale made lots of money before Joan showed up. Obviously, she scared off all the customers.

Plagiarism is deceitful because it is dishonest.

I am athletic because I run, and I run because I'm athletic.

There aren't enough parking spaces on campus because there are too many cars.

smoking cigarettes is deadly because cigarettes can kill you

Marcus wants to go to a small community college close to home, but most of the kids in his class are applying to larger colleges out of state. Marcus decides that he should also apply to those colleges.

In the court trial deliberations, Juror Seven says, "There are still eleven of us who think he's guilty. You're alone." His attempt to use numbers to persuade Eight is: "If everyone believes it, you should too."
An influencer posts on Instagram that the restaurant "EP is poppin'! Everyone worth knowing is here tonight - come on down!" -- this is an example of:
Officer, I was only driving as fast as everyone around me. You can't give me a ticket for doing what every other driver on the road was also doing.
